span.div: Placement, College Credit, and Credit Recovery.

a.title: Go to comments for Montana Digital Academy

div.h1: As per Governor Bullock Frenchtown schools will be closed from March 16th through May 6th for students.

iframe.style: z-index: -1000; position: absolute; visibility: visible; left: 897px; top: 388.672px;

div.p: School Closure for the Remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year

a.title: Go to comments for Administration to Recommend

img.alt: Frenchtown School Board Meeting Live on the web

a.span: Frenchtown School Board Meeting Live on the web

div.p: The Board meeting will be available via Zoom on a live web conference

a.title: Go to comments for Frenchtown School Board Meeting Live on the web

div.p: Frenchtown School District needs your input on how to finish the school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Frenchtown School District Public Survey

div.p: Governor Bullock ordered all Montana schools to continue to be closed until May 6, 2020, to help lower the curve on the spread of COVID-19. Frenchtown School District #40 is delivering educational services off-campus to all PK-12 students during the shutdown.

a.title: Go to comments for FTSD UPDATE FOR PARENTS (April 22, 2020)

div.p: As you are aware, the Governor has issued a reopening plan for the state which included local school districts to determine to allow in-person instruction on May 7th.

a.title: Go to comments for Montana High School Association Update

img.alt: FREE SUMMER FOOD SERVICE PROGRAM NOW AVAILABLE DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE

a.span: FREE SUMMER FOOD SERVICE PROGRAM NOW AVAILABLE DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE

div.p: In this unprecedented time of school closures, many Montana children are at risk of experiencing learning loss without access to healthy meals. The USDA’s Summer Food Service Program (SFSP) helps combat learning loss by providing meals to kids and teens, age 18 and under.

a.title: Go to comments for FREE SUMMER FOOD SERVICE PROGRAM NOW AVAILABLE DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE

img.alt: Information About the School Board Candidates for the 2020 School Election

a.span: Information About the School Board Candidates for the 2020 School Election

div.p: There are three candidates that have filed for the two trustee positions. Filing for open trustee positions ended Thursday, March 26, 2020. No write-in candidates filed.

a.title: Go to comments for Information About the School Board Candidates for the 2020 School Election

div.p: Notice is hereby given by the undersigned Clerk of Frenchtown School District No. 40, Missoula County, the State of Montana that the Annual School Election will be held on Tuesday, May 5, 2020, by mail ballot.

a.title: Go to comments for NOTICE OF ANNUAL SCHOOL ELECTION

div.p: he below linked document represents the District’s required Plan of Action

a.title: Go to comments for FTSD PLAN OF ACTION
